name: rpgamcl

stmt.origin: eqeltrrd(cfv(cgam, c0), crp, cfv(ce, cfv(clgam, c0)), wcel(c0, crp))
stmt.pretty: eqeltrrd((_G ` c0), crp, (exp `(log_G ` c0)), c0 ∈ ℝ+)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(cfv(cgam, c0), crp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ce, cfv(clgam, c0)), cfv(cgam, c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(clgam, c0)), crp))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(cfv(cgam, c0), crp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ce, cfv(clgam, c0)), cfv(cgam, c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(clgam, c0)), crp))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ce, cfv(clgam, c0)), cfv(cgam, c0)), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cdif(cz, cn))))

body.origin:

-| wi(wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cdif(cz, cn))), wceq(cfv(ce, cfv(clgam, c0)), cfv(cgam, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cdif(cz, cn))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(cfv(cgam, c0), crp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(clgam, c0)), crp))

|- wi(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(clgam, c0)), crp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(cfv(clgam, c0), cr))

comment: The log-Gamma function is positive real for positive real input. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2017.)
